case_vignette: A 55-year-old man comes into your office for an eye exam. The patient states he has had some trouble seeing over the last few weeks. He denies a history of pain. He has a history of HIV. He states that he was diagnosed with HIV about 20 years ago due to his intravenous drug usage. He has not used any drugs in the past 10 years, but states he also does not take his medications. His last CD4+ count (6 months ago) was 42. His vitals are normal and Figure A shows his fundoscopic exam. On eye exam, the patient has both some central and peripheral vision loss.
question: What is the most likely diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Infectious Diseases. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been having some trouble seeing over the last few weeks.
Have you had any other vision problems or symptoms?
I'm experiencing both central and peripheral vision loss.
Have you had any recent injuries or accidents?
No, I haven't had any recent injuries or accidents.

The vignette doesn't mention anything about changes in my weight or appetite.
Have you had any recent changes in your sleep patterns?
The vignette doesn't mention any changes in my sleep patterns.
Have you had any recent travel history?
The vignette doesn't mention any recent travel history.
Have you had any recent changes in your medication regimen?
No, I have not been taking my medications.
Have you had any recent changes in your family history?
The vignette doesn't provide information about recent changes in my family history.
Final Diagnosis: Retinal Detachment.
